title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi
fullTitle: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2019)

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.plot: A young woman falls from a bar's upstairs terrace and a suicide note is found, but a pregnancy test and links to a political group suggest foul play.

episodes.title: 2. Bölüm
episodes.plot: Behzat runs into an old flame in a psych ward. A child's body found with both kidneys removed prompts suspicions of criminal organ trafficking.

episodes.title: Gerçegin Pesinde
episodes.plot: When an ex-con who killed a woman in a robbery is murdered shortly after his release, Behzat suspects a former cop did it to avenge his wife's death.

episodes.title: Görünenin Ardindaki Sir
episodes.plot: The stabbing deaths of a fencing teacher and his elderly neighbor cast suspicion on an alleged gold digger, an estranged wife, her lover and others.

episodes.title: Kayip Yasamlar
episodes.plot: A financial adviser is killed in a parking garage getting in a car he bought for his son's birthday. Was the car's previous owner the intended target?

episodes.title: Gecenin Gizledikleri
episodes.plot: After receiving an insistent warning from a fan, a rising nightclub singer is strangled while sleeping over at friend Gönül's home.

episodes.title: Kapanmayan Yaralar
episodes.plot: When a young woman is found raped and murdered in her home, the police try to work out why the killer left out-of-circulation banknotes on her body.

episodes.title: Geçmisin Gölgesi
episodes.plot: When the police question a young woman who reported her identical twin sister's murder, they discover a world of difference between the two siblings.

episodes.title: Taban Girmek
episodes.plot: A soccer star is found cuffed to a bed and killed by a blow to the chest, casting suspicion on his jealous girlfriend, his shady manager and others.

episodes.title: Karanlik Koridorlar
episodes.plot: When a man accused of illegal magazine distribution dies in police custody, Behzat must lead a touchy investigation that could impact his colleagues.

episodes.title: Cevapsiz Sorular
episodes.plot: Photos found on Facebook and in a home identify suspects in the murder of a college student found on a roadside, and reveal a personal link to Behzat.

episodes.title: Geride Kalanlar
episodes.plot: Sitting on the rooftop terrace from which his daughter fell to her death, Behzat notices something that could possibly provide the answers he seeks.

episodes.title: Yarim Kalmis Hesaplar
episodes.plot: Behzat finds himself in a race against time to save his brother from a revenge-seeking kidnapper who has a personal connection to a recent case.

episodes.title: Tehlikeli Iliskiler
episodes.plot: Behzat's last conversation with his brother's kidnapper leads the detective on a hunt for evidence that will expose the undersecretary's wife.

episodes.title: Karanlikta kalanlar
episodes.plot: When an ad agency owner is found murdered in her hotel room, suspects include her angry ex-husband and a model she fired over a fashion show mishap.

episodes.title: Güvercin Tedirginligi
episodes.plot: The fatal shooting of a professor studying the problems of Turkish minorities gives rise to speculation that his murder was politically motivated.

episodes.title: Diken Üstünde
episodes.plot: When Feride unexpectedly goes to the police to make a confession, Behzat and his men fear their part in the matter will be discovered.

episodes.title: Kayip Zamanlar
episodes.plot: A second killing during the investigation of a toy shop owner's murder leads Behzat's team to a decade-old case that links the two victims.

episodes.title: Hesaplasma
episodes.plot: When Ercüment returns to Ankara to discuss his agreement with the undersecretary and a murder soon follows, Behzat sets out to prove he's the killer.

episodes.title: Küçük Balik Büyük Balik
episodes.plot: Feride gives her testimony in court. Behzat's continued pursuit of Ercüment takes him and his team from Ankara's streets to Istanbul's.

episodes.title: Yasarken Ölmek
episodes.plot: Behzat gets a rare chance to investigate a murder before it actually occurs, when a man dying from arsenic poisoning asks him to find out who did it.

episodes.title: Dinmeyen Öfke
episodes.plot: After his late daughter's ex-boyfriend is released from prison, Behzat questions him and learns more about the last days of Berna's life.

episodes.title: Yerdeki Kan
episodes.plot: A man who stalked the wife of a murdered gynecologist is ruled out as a suspect. So why are his prints found soon after at an unrelated murder scene?

episodes.title: Zikzak Yaparak Kaçmak
episodes.plot: Cocaine packets found on a man who was shot to death suggest a drug dispute, but further investigation reveals a cover-up of the true motive.

episodes.title: Intihar ve Cinayet
episodes.plot: The death of a drummer who seemingly killed herself with a gas oven leads to her boyfriend's apparent suicide, but Behzat suspects both were murders.

episodes.title: Sihhiye Köprüsü
episodes.plot: Behzat and his team investigate the murder of a meatball vendor thrown from a bridge. Sule runs into problems while trying to tutor Behzat's nephew.

episodes.title: Adini Vermek Istemeyen Dinleyici
episodes.plot: The homicide team takes on a rare nonmurder case when a kidnapper calls a local radio show, threatening to kill the announcer's 5-year-old daughter.

episodes.title: Kelebek Gibi Uçmak
episodes.plot: The investigation of a boxer who was found stabbed to death leads Behzat and his team into the dark underworld of illegal fighting matches.

episodes.title: Aysegül Arafta
episodes.plot: In a trash heap, garbage collectors find the body of a young woman whose tattoos lead Behzat's team to investigate the possibility of a satanic cult.

episodes.title: Iz Birakanlar Unutulmaz
episodes.plot: A retired Colonel named Can Uçar is found dead in his house. It seemed that the colonel shot himself in a ceremonial suicide. But the Murder Squad believes that the colonel was murdered and the suicide faked. Chief Constable asks Behzat Ç to investigate. Behzat Ç. finds that Colonel was interviewed by a reporter and he tries to find her. One the girl is located he realises that Can Uçar's murder was just the tip of the iceberg. Behzat ç. gets critical information from reporter which puts his life in danger.

episodes.title: Gece Baskini
episodes.plot: The body of a failed political candidate is found riddled with bullets. Was it his divisive politics that got him killed? Or his harassment of women?

episodes.title: Kisisel Gelismek
episodes.plot: When a life coach is strangled shortly after a seminar, footage of the event shows a mysterious briefcase that never left his side -- but is now gone.

episodes.title: Kizilcahamam
episodes.plot: During a vacation getaway, Behzat investigates the murder of a symposium speaker at the same resort and is shocked when he gets the ballistics report.

episodes.title: Maziden Gelen
episodes.plot: Suspects abound in the murder of a real estate developer, who was unhappily married four times and had recently fired his brother-in-law.

episodes.title: Içimizdeki Cellat
episodes.plot: The murder of a mother and her two small kids leads Behzat's team to her husband, the relatives who disapproved of her marriage and a missing vagrant.

episodes.title: Gece Uçusu
episodes.plot: The homicide team investigates the murder of a airline hostess who had made many enemies at work before being killed. Behzat and Sulle sink into depression over Ecrument's return to the city.

episodes.title: Tekinsiz Yollar
episodes.plot: Ecrument is deemed not worth protecting any longer, and Big Brother sends a squad of special police from Istanbul to Ankara to kill him. Selim is finally caught by Eda, and Harun forgives Cevat. Behzat tries to keep up.

episodes.title: Baslangicin Sonu
episodes.plot: The team tries to hide Eda and Selim's news from Harun on his big day. Behzat learns why Ercüment has been vengeful toward him, and who killed Berna.
